text: The Miss South Carolina World competition is a beauty pageant that selects the representative for South Carolina in the Miss World America pageant.The American representatives to Miss World 1978-1994 The current Miss South Carolina World is Megan Gordon of North Augusta. == Winners == ;Color key {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" ! width=5% | Year ! width=20%| Name ! width=10%|
